forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms between 4pm and 5pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
